ARABIC: وَأُخْرَىٰ لَمْ تَقْدِرُوا۟ عَلَيْهَا قَدْ أَحَاطَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And other booty you do not yet have the power to take - Allah has already encompassed it. Allah has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And other (benefits) which you have not yet obtained, are within the compass of God, for God has power over everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He also promises you other spoils which you have not yet taken, but Allah has encompassed them. Allah has power over everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Besides these, there were other gains which you could not receive, but God has full control over them. God has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And one more, not within your capacity, is within Allah’s hold; and Allah is Able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And other (victories) which are not yet within your power; indeed Allah encompasses them. And Allah is Ever Able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And others which you have not yet been able to achieve Allah has surely encompassed them, and Allah has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and other spoils you were not able to take; God had encompassed them already. God is powerful over everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And other (gain), which ye have not been able to achieve, Allah will compass it, Allah is Able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And there are yet other [gains] which are still beyond your grasp, [but] which God has already encompassed [for you]: for God has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And He promiseth another victory, over which ye have as yet no power: Allah hath surely encompassed it; and Allah is over everything ever Potent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And other [spoils as well] which you have not yet captured: Allah has comprehended them, and Allah has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And other gains (there are), which are not within your power, but which Allah has compassed: and Allah has power over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And other (victories and much booty there are, He promises you) which are not yet within your power, indeed Allah compasses them, And Allah is Ever Able to do all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And there were (other spoils) which you were unable to take. Allah has encompassed it already, Allah is powerful over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And other things, of which you were incapable, but God has encompassed them. God is Capable of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [He promises] other [victories] that you were [so far] unable to [realize] which Allah has already encompassed. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [48:21] and others (wa-ukhrā is an adjectival qualification of the implied subject maghānima, ‘spoils’) which you were not able to capture — namely, [spoils] from the Persians and the Byzantines; God has verily encompassed these [already], that is to say, He knows that they will be yours. And God has power over all things, that is to say, He is ever possessed of such an attribute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And other (gain)) and other booty, (which ye have not been able to achieve) yet, (Allah will compass it) Allah knows that it will happen, this is the booty Persia. (Allah is Able to do all things) of conquest, victory and capturing booty.
